availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Letcher Tipton (Bath County, Kentucky, blacksmith)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, blacksmith. Kentucky native. Married to Evaline Tipton. Father of James Tipton, Sarah Tipton, Mary Tipton, Sidney Tipton, John Tipton, and Evaline Tipton. Blacksmith in Bath County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 83.
Find A Grave, "Robert Lipton Tipton (January 1, 1822-April 4, 1899)," Memorial #47309094, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/47309094 (accessed March 15, 2019).
